mapper.select: select * from notice_board where BOARD_ID = #{ id }

select * from (select rownum rnum, board_id, member_id, title, substance, read_count, regist_dt, last_upd_dt from (select * from notice_board order by regist_dt desc, board_id desc)) where rnum between #{ startRow } and #{ endRow }
mapper.update: update notice_board set READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 where BOARD_ID = #{ no }
mapper.insert: insert into notice_board values (NVL((select max(board_Id) ,0)+ 1 from notice_board), #{memberID}, #{title}, #{substance}, default, SYSDATE ,SYSDATE , #{originalFilePath}, #{renameFilePath})
mapper.delete: delete from notice_board where board_ID = #{ no }
